metadata.title: CVE-2015-0840 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The dpkg-source command in Debian dpkg before 1.16.16 and 1.17.x before1.17.25 allows remote attackers to bypass signature verification via acrafted Debian source control file (.dsc).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dpkg - 1.17.5ubuntu5.4
dselect - 1.17.5ubuntu5.4
libdpkg-perl - 1.17.5ubuntu5.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dpkg package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.5ubuntu5.4').
